price: Nyankopͻn Somafoͻ (Soalihu) ka kyerεε wͻn sε: “(Aboa no) yε Nyankopͻn yoma bedeε, enti moma no kwan na ͻnom nsuo (no bi).
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
